attributes.action: Help St Christopher's Hospice With Funding
attributes.additional_details: St Christopher's Hospice helps the terminally ill patients.  It was founded in 1967 and is still running.  It costs the Hospice over 14million a year to keep all services within the Hospice running.  Around a third of the income is from the NHS.  They have to raise a remaining 9 million a year on their own.
